hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin Mughaffal that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"None of you should urinate in the place where he bathes, for most Waswas (devilish whispers) [1] come from that." [1] I.e., with regard to whether the urine has soiled his body or not

chapter.eng-name: That It Is Disliked To Urinate In A Place Where One Bathes
